thread.section_title: Lube Mobile Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lube Mobile | lubemobile.com.au
thread.title: Tony

author: Tony
title: Tony
text: Great communication following my online booking. On time and contacted me to say they were on the way. Aaron presented well and got straight to work.... clear confident diagnosis of the problem and a detailed Quote: . Had to get parts and was back within 30 mins with parts in hand. He wanted to get job completed so i was not without a vehicle for another day, even though it was getting late in the afternoon. Aaron Mobile A18 ( Castle Hill NSW) is a credit to himself and your business. I have had over 30 years in customer service management with a number of large multi nationals and he exhibits all the behaviors one would look for in an employee. Well done Aaron and well done Lube Mobile .... cant fault todays experience !!!
